special_text:
[+1]: Create a green enchantment token named Swarm with “At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.”
[-2]: Create a green enchantment token named Survive with “Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain life equal to its power.”
[-4]: Create a green enchantment token named Scrounge with “Whenever a creature you control enters, draw a card.”
